pages.title: Page 2
pages.content: This is the content of Page 2.

pages.title: Day 1: Departure from Lucknow to Jaipur via Delhi
pages.subtitle: Train Journey Begins
pages.description: Your journey starts on 10/09/2024 with a train from Lucknow to Jaipur via Delhi. Enjoy a comfortable ride and scenic views along the way.

pages.title: Night Stay at Hotel
pages.subtitle: Arrival and Check-in
pages.description: Arrive in Jaipur at night and check into Hotel Jaipur Palace for a restful night before starting your exploration on 11/09/2024.

pages.title: Day 2: Explore Historic Monuments
pages.subtitle: Start Your Adventure
pages.description: Begin your exploration on 11/09/2024 in the morning. Visit Jaipur's historic monuments and local delights.
pages.footer: ✨ Enjoy the royal history of Jaipur! ✨

pages.title: Morning - Hawa Mahal and Jantar Mantar
pages.subtitle: Discover Iconic Landmarks
pages.description: Visit Hawa Mahal (9:30 AM - 10:30 AM) for a unique architectural experience and explore the ancient observatory Jantar Mantar (11:00 AM - 12:00 PM).

pages.title: Mid-Morning - City Palace
pages.subtitle: Royal Grandeur
pages.description: Head to the City Palace (12:30 PM - 2:00 PM) and explore its museums, courtyards, and stunning architecture.

pages.title: Afternoon - Govind Dev Mandir and Bapu Bazaar
pages.subtitle: Spiritual and Local Flavors
pages.description: Visit Govind Dev Mandir (2:30 PM - 3:00 PM) for spiritual solace and enjoy some shopping and street food at Bapu Bazaar (3:30 PM - 5:00 PM).
pages.footer: 🛍️ Shop and Snack like a Local! 🛍️

pages.title: Evening - Sardar ki Lassi, Shriram Chaat, and Masala Chawk
pages.subtitle: Food Adventure
pages.description: End your day with a glass of lassi at Sardar ki Lassi (5:30 PM - 6:00 PM) and try delicious street food at Masala Chawk (6:30 PM - 8:00 PM).

pages.title: Day 3: Museums, Temples, and Cultural Sites
pages.subtitle: Explore More of Jaipur
pages.description: Continue your exploration on 12/09/2024 by visiting Albert Hall Museum (9:00 AM - 10:30 AM), followed by the Zoo (11:00 AM - 12:30 PM) and the serene Birla Mandir (1:00 PM - 2:00 PM).

pages.title: Day 4: Forts and Modern Attractions
pages.subtitle: Explore the Majestic Forts
pages.description: Begin your final day on 13/09/2024 with a visit to the Jal Mahal (9:00 AM - 9:30 AM) and continue to the famous forts: Amer Fort (10:00 AM - 12:00 PM), Jaigarh Fort (12:30 PM - 2:00 PM), and Nahargarh Fort (2:30 PM - 4:00 PM).

pages.title: Evening - World Trade Park and Pink City
pages.subtitle: Modern Jaipur
pages.description: Conclude your trip by visiting the World Trade Park (5:00 PM - 7:00 PM) for shopping and enjoy the vibrant streets of the Pink City at night (7:30 PM onwards).
